episodes.title: Cults in the UK: The Truth About the Jesus Army | UK Crime Diaries
episodes.description:
Welcome to UK Crime Diaries, your go-to channel for in-depth explorations of the UK's most chilling true crime stories. In today's episode, we delve into the dark and unsettling world of the Jesus Army, a notorious religious cult that operated in the United Kingdom.

Join us as we uncover the origins of the Jesus Army, also known as the Jesus Fellowship Church, and its transformation from a Christian movement to a manipulative and controlling cult. We'll explore the shocking allegations of abuse, exploitation, and brainwashing that plagued the group, and hear harrowing accounts from former members who bravely share their stories.

From its charismatic leader to its controversial practices, we leave no stone unturned in our investigation of this enigmatic and dangerous cult. Discover how the Jesus Army rose to power, the impact it had on its followers, and the legal battles that ultimately led to its downfall.

Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe to UK Crime Diaries for more true crime stories from across the UK. Hit the notification bell so you never miss an update!

#TrueCrime #JesusArmy #UKCrimeDiaries #Cults #UKTrueCrime #JesusFellowshipChurch #CrimeDocumentary #Exposé
